rule.description: ADS Zone.Identifier Deleted by Uncommon Application

rule.field: ^C:\\\\Program Files\\\\PowerShell\\\\7-preview\\\\pwsh\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files\\\\PowerShell\\\\7\\\\pwsh\.exe$|^C:\\\\Windows\\\\explorer\.exe$|C:\\\\Windows\\\\System32\\\\WindowsPowerShell\\\\v1\.0\\\\powershell\.exe$|^C:\\\\Windows\\\\SysWOW64\\\\explorer\.exe$|^C:\\\\Windows\\\\SysWOW64\\\\WindowsPowerShell\\\\v1\.0\\\\powershell\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files \(x86\)\\\\Google\\\\Chrome\\\\Application\\\\chrome\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files\\\\Google\\\\Chrome\\\\Application\\\\chrome\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files \(x86\)\\\\Mozilla Firefox\\\\firefox\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files\\\\Mozilla Firefox\\\\firefox\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files \(x86\)\\\\Microsoft\\\\Edge\\\\Application\\\\msedge\.exe$|^C:\\\\Program Files\\\\Microsoft\\\\Edge\\\\Application\\\\msedge\.exe$
rule.description: ADS Zone.Identifier Deleted by Common Application
